EmailTemplate.description: Every time that the time of a session is updated all the stakeholders of that sessions must be warned
EmailTemplate.name: ERM Session notification - Time slot change
EmailTemplate.subject: Change in time slot for {!Session__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear colleague(s),
Note that the time slot for {!Session__c.Name} has changed to {!Session__c.Session_Info__c}.
Please confirm the attendance of {!Event_Registration__c.Name} by clicking on the link.
Click here to see how to confirm or reject the attendance in sCRM.
